option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Example environment variables # Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
# Required: Google Gemini API Key GEMINI_API_KEY=your_gemini_api_key_here
# Optional: Groq API Key (if using Groq) GROQ_API_KEY=your_groq_api_key_here
# Qdrant Configuration QDRANT_URL=http://localhost:6333

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Python application FROM python:3.13-slim
# Set working directory WORKDIR /app
# Install system dependencies RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \ curl \ && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
# Copy requirements first for better caching COPY requirements.txt .
# Install Python dependencies RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
# Copy application code COPY . .
# Expose FastAPI port EXPOSE 8000
# Command to run the application CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
#!/bin/bash
# Colors for output GREEN='\033[0;32m' RED='\033[0;31m' YELLOW='\033[1;33m' NC='\033[0m' # No Color
echo -e "${YELLOW} Stopping all services...${NC}"
# Stop FastAPI if [ -f .fastapi.pid ]; then FASTAPI_PID=$(cat .fastapi.pid) if ps -p $FASTAPI_PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then kill $FASTAPI_PID echo -e "${GREEN}✅ FastAPI stopped${NC}" fi rm .fastapi.pid fi
# Stop Inngest if [ -f .inngest.pid ]; then INNGEST_PID=$(cat .inngest.pid) if ps -p $INNGEST_PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then kill $INNGEST_PID echo -e "${GREEN}✅ Inngest stopped${NC}" fi rm .inngest.pid fi
# Stop Qdrant if docker ps | grep -q qdrant-rag; then docker stop qdrant-rag > /dev/null 2>&1 docker rm qdrant-rag > /dev/null 2>&1 echo -e "${GREEN}✅ Qdrant stopped${NC}" fi
echo -e "${GREEN}✅ All services stopped${NC}"
